plugin-data.name: Yandex Turbo
plugin-data.description:
This plugin generates an RSS feed of your site for generate yandex-turbo pages.
The feed has the default URL https://example.com/turbo.xml

amount-of-items-to-show-on-the-feed: Amount of items to show on the feed.
ya-tip: To add turbo pages you need to enter the Yandex-Webmaster panel https://webmaster.yandex.ru in the Sources section add the full url to your XML file.
